system.description: Every creature is considered to have all basic abilities by default. However, some basic abilities may have additional requirements that must be met in order to actually be used.

overview.base: You use the MP in a mana storing to pay 1 or more of the MP for the ability.

system.requirements: The invoked item must be mana storing and have more than 0 stored MP.
system.trigger: You are spending MP on some ability.

overview.base: The MP is spent into the target. Any effects are determined by the GM.

value.variable: An amount of MP of your choosing.

overview.base: Roll [[/roll 1d20 + @per]]. You see any hidden creatures with a "Hidden DC" less than or equal to your roll.
Instead of your normal feat save DC, the DC of Self Revert is determined by the type of transformation.

system.description: Elder Sorcery is the art of naming the world using the true words of creation to alter reality. This art is believed to have been first mastered by the dragons and taught to mortals in the elder days. As it is meddling with the raw "stuff" of the world, Elder Sorcery requires a great deal more preparation and mana to create and successfully cast than the common "prefabricated" spells. The first step is to learn Elder Sorcery words, which are thought to be the ancient first names for things given by the dragons as the world was created. These words can be used to make sentences to create an effect.

Elder Sorcery is the art of naming the world using the true words of creation to alter reality. This art is believed to have been first mastered by the dragons and taught to mortals in the elder days. As it is meddling with the raw "stuff" of the world, Elder Sorcery requires a great deal more preparation and mana to create and successfully cast than the common "prefabricated" spells. The first step is to learn Elder Sorcery words, which are thought to be the ancient first names for things given by the dragons as the world was created. These words can be used to make sentences to create an effect.
All adventurers start out as journeymen before selecting an actual class.

overview.base: You gain Improved Strength and Melee Damage Boost. In addition, you are no longer suffer the consequences of cumbersome items.
You gain Beastly Strength and Improved Armor Piercing.

Can wield two-handed weapons in one hand.
Note: AP weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be AV0.
Melee weapons you use are armor piercing.
You may spend an unused action to boost the triggering damage.
overview.proficient: You may spend an additional unused action to boost the triggering damage again.

system.trigger: You have hit a creature with a damaging melee weapon attack.

overview.base: You cannot use items in your hands.
You have 50 @Wiki[Core:HP]{HP} per @Wiki[Core:Size]{SIZE} and @Wiki[Category:Keywords]{deboost} all @Core[Damage]{damage} from non-@Wiki[Category:Axes]{axes}.
You are @Keyword[Immunity]{immune} to falling @Condition[Unconscious]{unconscious}.
You are @Keyword[Immunity]{immune} to @Wiki[Category:Bows]{arrows} and @Wiki[Category:Vitals target abilities]{vitals target abilities}.
